item.title: A new adventure
item.description:
Yeah! The first post.
I really wanted to start my blog and I finally decided to install everything to do so.
Even if you only see a simple page, I had a fun time with my Azure Pipeline.
item.content:encoded:
Yeah! The first post.
I really wanted to start my blog and I finally decided to install everything to do so.
Even if you only see a simple page, I had a fun time with my Azure Pipeline.

The source code of my blog is hosted on Azure DevOps and with one push to the Git repository, the Pipeline compiles my blog and publishes the result automatically to my GitHub Pages. It's magic!
Like you can see, there are still several things to configure on this blog but if I don't start now I'll never start!
Enjoy ;)
